oldspeak 0.0.1 documentation

  • ← Design
  • oldspeak 0.0.1 documentation

Source Code Access¶

Git Repository¶

https://github.com/0rbitAeolian/OldSpeak

System Dependencies¶

GNU core-utils
python 2.7
nodejs v6.9.4
libgpgme
libev
libmysqlclient-dev
libgit2

Service Dependencies¶

Redis Server >= 3.2.6

Example¶

sudo sed '/oldspeak/d' /etc/hosts
sudo echo -e "\n127.0.0.1\toldspeak" >> /etc/hosts
pip install virtualenv
git clone git@github.com:0rbitAeolian/OldSpeak.git
cd oldspeak
virtualenv venv
source venv/bin/activate
pip install -U pip setuptools
pip install -r development.txt
make static
make web

Tip

If everything worked fine, you should be able to access http://oldspeak:1984 and play along.
